name: Isle of Dinosaurs 2D
description:
A classic 2D action maze game with pixel art graphics featuring two playable characters, co-op gameplay and dinosaurs.

Summary


Upon returning from school you proceed to play, as usual, in your grandpa's house.
You find a ceremonial mask in one of the bedrooms.
You decide to wear it for fun and go outside in the garden where you notice a portal, which was otherwise invisible to the naked eye.

While approaching the portal you get teleported, without your will into a prehistoric world.

Characters


You can choose between playing a boy or girl:



Dinosaurs NPCs:

- young and elder Anky

- young and elder Rex

- young and elder Ptery

Full list is WIP.

Maps


Maps are maze like, you have to collect powerups and items that will help you teleport back home.
